attributes.action: Make the UK the 51st state of the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe there are massive benefits to the UK and its citizens becoming the 51st state of the United States of America these are listed below.
1/ We would have a proper bill of rights.
2/ we would become part of the American constitution.
3/ we would NOT be able to be extradited to any other foreign state.
4/ Our Military would have the best equipment in the world and would become Americas Special Forces influencing training and operations more effectively around the world.
5/ 51st State Americas best state.
6/ we would have proper immigration Laws for our citizens.
7/ No ID cards.
8/ More direct influence of American Foreign Policy.
9/ Tony Blair could become president.
10/ No more pretence of identity, no more being Americas lap dog but become America’s brain for the benefit of all.
11/ Direct economic influence and support, 51st state companies supported and able to grow in America.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
